original_text: After this Jesus went about in Galilee. He would not go about in Judea, because the Jews were seeking to kill him.
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 갈릴리에서 다니시고 유대에서 다니려 아니하심은 유대인들이 죽이려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: After this Jesus went about in Galilee.
He would not go about in Judea,
because the Jews were seeking to kill him.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 유대인들이 그를 죽이려고 했기 때문입니다.
